meanings.definition: Not lasting; not able to endure for a long time.
meanings.sent1: The nondurable paper cup started leaking after a few minutes.
meanings.sent2: The nondurable toy broke easily when dropped.
meanings.sent3: The nondurable umbrella gave up during the light drizzle.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as nondurable as a soap bubble.
meanings.sent5: The nondurable ice sculpture melted under the hot sun.

meanings.definition: Not durable; not able to withstand wear, pressure, or damage.
meanings.sent1: The nondurable plastic bag tore easily when filled with groceries.
meanings.sent2: The nondurable shoes fell apart after a few days of use.
meanings.sent3: The nondurable phone case cracked just from being in a pocket.
meanings.sent4: His promises were as nondurable as sandcastles at high tide.
meanings.sent5: The nondurable fabric ripped at the slightest tug.
